title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed with any model served by Ollama.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Bun, Deno and browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs or embedders.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, admin, RAG, multi-user).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Terminal UI wrapper around Ollama with chat history, syntax highlighting, model picker.

title: ollama-copilot (github-copilot-local)
summary: VS-Code extension that routes Copilot requests to a local Ollama model.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Lightweight RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma for document Q&A.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama with Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-agents
summary: Experimental multi-agent orchestration framework on top of Ollama.

title: ollama-npm (npm search)
summary: Official Ollama JS client downloaded 70k+ times/month.

title: ollama on PyPI
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, 100k+ monthly downloads.

title: reddit/r/ollama – weekly integrations thread
summary: Community-curated list of new Ollama tools, UIs and libraries.

title: Hacker News: Show HN: Ollama Hub – share & download model configs
summary: Launch of Ollama Hub, a registry for custom Modelfile snippets and tooling.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Ready-made compose stacks for CPU & GPU setups plus WebUI sidecar.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community .NET SDK for Ollama supporting .NET 6+ and ASP.NET Core.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that brings local LLM assistance via Ollama into notes.

title: ollama-django
summary: Reusable Django app exposing Ollama models through admin and REST APIs.
